name: PARODIANUS II: 致命的な外国人ロバのリターン
name_original: PARODIANUS II: 致命的な外国人ロバのリターン
description:
Game made (first) withinin 48h for LDJAM 39 Compo - Another tribute to my favorites shmup , not as good as the originals but probably a little more absurd and  confusing.

XXXXXXXXXXX WARNING XXXXXXXXXXX

This games contains Konami games ripp off, gross sprites, bad pixel art, very bad taste, screenshakes and pink colors.

In order to protect your ears from bleeding dead artists participated to the game's soundtrack writting MIDI files for video games centuries ago.

XXXX NOW YOU'VE BEEN WARNED XXXX

You're an alien lost in space, and running out of power for your ship. You have to maintain your power high in order to keep weapons efficient and shield working, because you may encounter some werid stuff in space during in your quest for power.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXX*** CONTROLS ***XXXXXXXXXXXXXX

XXXXXXXXXXXXXX***KEYBOARD 1 ***XXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Arrows = moves

Space = shoot

Control = Select bonus

Enter = start

XXXXXXXXXXXXXX***KEYBOARD 2 ***XXXXXXXXXXXXXX

numpad 8-4-5-6 = moves

numpad 0v= shoot

delete  = Select bonus

XXXXXXXXXXXXXX***GAMEPADS (1 & 2)***XXXXXXXXXXXXXX

game pad joystick 1 = moves

a= shoot

b = Select bonus

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX????????????????XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Select controller for each player, then select "2 player" and press start to begin a multiplayer game.

You can also select difficulty and mute music.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Gameplay :

Killem all. Grab their energy when they die. Take candy powerups. Upgrade your weapons. You'll need patience and preparation in order to go back to your home qnd loved ones, and get rid of gross things that are shooting at you for no other reason  to kill, confuse, make you laught and have a fun time, or annoy you...

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

< 1 minute of random game things
